name: Mycelium
description: Trade with liquidity, leverage, and low fees. Trade with Mycelium. Traders on Mycelium can trade Perpetual Swaps and Perpetual Pools with a range of bluechip DeFi assets including BTC, ETH, LINK, UNI and more hosted on Arbitrum. Perpetual Swaps traders enjoy extremely low fees, with zero price impact whilst Perpetual Pools traders can enjoy trading with no liquidations, no margins, and no minimum commits.
